messages.title: Getting on with the country's priorities
messages.content: More investment for our Welsh NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The UK Government is investing £1.2 billion extra in the Welsh NHS, with a commitment from the Welsh Conservative Government to continue investing in the Welsh NHS for generations.

issues.health: The NHS is part of our heritage. It's a statement of who we are as a country. The UK Government is investing £1.2 billion extra in the Welsh NHS. It's up to the Welsh Labour Government whether they actually spend this money or just sit on it like they have before. It is only a future Welsh Conservative Government who will invest in our Welsh NHS for generations to come.

contactInformation.address: 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ. Lower Ground Floor, 16-18 Finsbury Circus, London, EC2M 7EB.

images.caption: A person in medical attire holding a stethoscope, symbolizing the NHS.
